name: Word Brain - Search the Words
description:
Word Brain is an app designed to train your brain and learn new words.

The aim of the game is to find all hidden words.

HOW TO PLAY
• Words can be vertical, horizontal, diagonal and even backwards.
• Simply swipe your finger over a word to select it.
• If you've found a valid word it will remain highlighted and marked on the word list as found.

NO INTERNET CONNECTION?
• You can play offline.

TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- Over 500 awesome and interesting levels! Updates will be continued!

WHAT MAKES WORD BRAIN SO SPECIAL?
• Simple, easy, and addictive gameplay!
• Login every day for a wonderful daily bonus!
• With no time limits, you can use your time wisely to find new words at your own pace!
• Hidden extra words are waiting to be discovered!
• Supported on all devices.
